Skills: The desired skills for an engineer studying projects and estimating costs include:
- Strong knowledge of architectural and civil engineering techniques and principles.
- Ability to analyze projects and accurately estimate costs.
- Strong planning and organizational skills to prepare operational plans.
- Knowledge of engineering standards and regulations.
- Effective communication and interpersonal skills to interact with clients and other technical teams.
